name: nfc-douyin-video
description: 碰一碰发抖音视频营销工具

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install && cd ../worker && npm install
scripts.worker:deploy: npm run build && cd worker && npm run deploy
scripts.worker:deploy:staging: npm run build && cd worker && npm run deploy:staging
scripts.worker:setup: cd worker && npm run kv:create && npm run kv:create:preview
